roleset.name: fasten the buttons on
roleset.note: BUTTON-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from button.01-v)

example.name: passive, arg1
example.text: [The bodice beneath]*-1 was buttoned [*-1]and , [*-2] withdrawing his lips fromhers , he set her upright on his knee and started [*-2] to undo it , unhurriedly as if she were achild .
